languages.text: "Есть и другой путь, моя леди. Здесь и сейчас — отриньте все беды своего Дома. Будьте со мной — столько, сколько позволят нам звезды".

traits.locale_text: "Есть и другой путь, моя леди. Здесь и сейчас — отриньте все беды своего Дома. Будьте со мной — столько, сколько позволят нам звезды".

languages.text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."
languages.original_text: "Есть и другой путь, моя леди. Здесь и сейчас — отриньте все беды своего Дома. Будьте со мной — столько, сколько позволят нам звезды".

traits.locale_text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast away your House's troubles. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us to."
"There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast away your House's troubles. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us to."
"There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast away your House's troubles. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us to."
"There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast away your House's troubles. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us to."
"There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."
"There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."

languages.text: 「道はもうひとつある、レディ・カシア。即決を要する道だ。君の家の問題を片付けろ。星々の許す限り、僕とともに在れ」
languages.original_text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: 「道はもうひとつある、レディ・カシア。即決を要する道だ。君の家の問題を片付けろ。星々の許す限り、僕とともに在れ」

languages.text: “不过，还有另外一条道路，我的女士。就在这里，就是现在，抛开家族的负担吧。只要群星允许，就永远留在我身边吧。”
languages.original_text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: “不过，还有另外一条道路，我的女士。就在这里，就是现在，抛开家族的一切烦恼吧。只要群星允许，就永远留在我身边吧。”

languages.text: « Il existe une autre voie, ma dame. Ici et maintenant. Oubliez votre maison. Restez à mes côtés aussi longtemps que les étoiles nous le permettront. »
languages.original_text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: « Il existe une autre voie, ma dame. Ici et maintenant. Oubliez votre maison. Restez à mes côtés aussi longtemps que les étoiles nous le permettront. »

languages.text: «Hay otro camino, milady. Aquí y ahora. Deje a un lado los problemas de su casa. Acompáñeme tan lejos como las estrellas nos permitan».
languages.original_text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: «Hay otro camino, milady. Aquí y ahora. Abandone los problemas de su casa. Acompáñeme tan lejos como las estrellas nos permitan».

languages.text: "Es gibt noch einen anderen Pfad, Mylady. Hier und jetzt. Legt die Sorgen Eures Hauses ab. Bleibt bei mir, so lange die Sterne es uns gestatten."
languages.original_text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt noch einen anderen Pfad, Mylady. Hier und jetzt. Legt die Sorgen Eures Hauses ab. Bleibt bei mir, so lange die Sterne es uns gestatten."

languages.text: "Bir yol daha var leydim. Haneni hemen şuracıkta boş ver. Yıldızlar bize müsaade ettikçe yanımda kal."
languages.original_text: "There is another path, my lady. Here and now. Cast your House's troubles aside. Be with me for as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: "Bir yol daha var leydim. Hanenin dertlerini bir kenara bırak. Hemen şimdi. Yıldızlar bize müsaade ettikçe yanımda kal."
